title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403/2020),
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Intoxicating Liquor Act 2003
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Intoxicating Liquor Act 2003 

(Section 21) (Royal Dublin Society) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited intoxicating liquor act 2003 (section 21) (royal dublin society) regulation 2025

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403/2020),
heading: In these Regulations “Act of 2003” means the Intoxicating Liquor Act
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Act of 2003” means the Intoxicating Liquor Act 

2003 (No. 31 of 2003).
text_norm: 2 regulation act 2003 mean intoxicating liquor act 2003 (no 31 2003)

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403/2020),
heading: 3. The stadium, known as Royal Dublin Society, Ballsbridge, Dublin 4, is
text_raw:
3. The stadium, known as Royal Dublin Society, Ballsbridge, Dublin 4, is 

designated as a national sporting arena.
text_norm: 3 stadium known royal dublin society ballsbridge dublin 4 designated national sporting arena

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403/2020),
heading: 4. The areas indicated by the colour red on the map of the designated
text_raw:
4. The areas indicated by the colour red on the map of the designated 
national sporting arena referred to in Regulation 3 and set out in Schedule 1 are 
prescribed for the purposes of section 21(4)(a) of the Act of 2003.
text_norm: 4 area indicated colour red map designated national sporting arena referred regulation 3 set schedule 1 prescribed purpose section 21(4)(a) act 2003

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403/2020),
heading: 5. The areas indicated by the colour blue on the map of the designated
text_raw:
5. The areas indicated by the colour blue on the map of the designated 
national sporting arena referred to in Regulation 3 and set out in Schedule 2 are 
prescribed for the purposes of section 21(4)(b) of the Act of 2003.
text_norm: 5 area indicated colour blue map designated national sporting arena referred regulation 3 set schedule 2 prescribed purpose section 21(4)(b) act 2003

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403/2020),
heading: 6. The Intoxicating Liquor Act 2003 (Section 21) (Royal Dublin Society)
text_raw:
6. The Intoxicating Liquor Act 2003 (Section 21) (Royal Dublin Society) 
Regulations 2012 (S.I. No. 47/2012) are revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 23rd May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [199] 3
text_norm: 6 intoxicating liquor act 2003 (section 21) (royal dublin society) regulation 2012 (s.i no 47 2012) revoked notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 23rd may 2025 199 3

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403/2020),
heading: Map referred to in Regulation 4
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 1 

Map referred to in Regulation 4 

The areas of the designated national sporting arena referred to in Regulation 3 
which are prescribed for the purposes of section 21(4)(a) of the Act of 2003 are 
indicated in red. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [199]
text_norm: schedule 1 map referred regulation 4 area designated national sporting arena referred regulation 3 prescribed purpose section 21(4)(a) act 2003 indicated red 4 199

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403/2020),
heading: Map referred to in Regulation 5
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 2 

Map referred to in Regulation 5 

The areas of the designated national sporting arena referred to in Regulation 3 
which are prescribed for the purpose of section 21(4)(b) of the Act of 2003 are 
indicated in blue. 

 
 
 
 
 [199] 5

15 April, 2025. 

PATRICK O’DONOVAN, 

Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media.
